ingredients with measurement: {'raw pecans': '1', 'salted pretzel twists': '1', 'ground cinnamon': '3/4', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2', 'dark or light brown sugar': '3/4', 'maple syrup': '2', 'apple butter (see notes for subs)': '1/4', 'egg, at room temperature': '1', 'vanilla extract': '3', 'all-purpose flour': '2 1/3', 'baking soda': '1', 'kosher salt': '1/2', 'semi-sweet chocolate chips or chunks': '1', 'coarse sugar': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 350° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Roll the dough into tablespoon size balls, then roll through the course sugar and place 3 inches apart on the prepared baking sheet. Insert your desired amount of pretzels to each cookie.', '6. Return to the oven and bake another 2-3 minutes or until the cookies are just beginning to set on the edges, but still doughy in the center. Let the cookies cool on the baking sheet.
